response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this item holds a significant importance to me. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This offer reflects a fair compromise between its value to both of us, ensuring that we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Should you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to ask. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
